title: Portable USB Software Pack 2 =HooglyBoogly=
description:
I removed Nero, PowerISO, and UltraISO. In their place, I now have ImgBurn.
I have also removed Foxit, CWShredder, Flashget, AVG, and Registry Mechanic.

Almost all of the software has been updated. The ones which weren&#039;t updated didn&#039;t have any newer versions available.
